scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:GalleryFileManagement_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($filesListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('filesListId'))
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('paged-files.vm')
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="AddFile">Add File</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="ConfirmDelete">Are you sure you want to delete this file?</resource> <resource name="Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="DownloadCSV">Export as CSV</resource> <resource name="DownloadFormat">{0} download</resource> <resource name="Downloads">Downloads</resource> <resource name="DownloadsFormat">{0} downloads</resource> <resource name="DownloadsOfFormat">Downloads of {0}</resource> <resource name="Edit">Edit</resource> <resource name="EndDate">End Date</resource> <resource name="FileDeleted">File has been deleted.</resource> <resource name="find">Find a file...</resource> <resource name="GalleryFileManagement_Description">Manage files.</resource> <resource name="GalleryFileManagement_Name">Files</resource> <resource name="LatestDownload">Latest download date: {0}</resource> <resource name="more">More</resource> <resource name="NoResults">No results</resource> <resource name="NotPublished">Unpublished</resource> <resource name="Publish">Publish</resource> <resource name="Published">Published</resource> <resource name="RecordFormat">{0} result.</resource> <resource name="RecordsFormat">{0} results.</resource> <resource name="ShowAllFiles">All</resource> <resource name="ShowUnpublished">Unpublished</resource> <resource name="StartDate">Start Date</resource> <resource name="Unpublish">Unpublish</resource> <resource name="View">View</resource> <resource name="ViewUser">View User Profile</resource> </language>
